profile.name: Joyce Byers
profile.summary: Resourceful and determined professional with 15+ years in retail operations and an extraordinary track record of investigation and advocacy when it matters most. Known for relentless persistence, deep intuition, and an unwavering commitment to protecting others — especially the most vulnerable.

evidence.outcome: Managed store operations solo during peak holiday seasons serving 200+ daily customers
evidence.description: Handled inventory, customer service, cash management, and vendor relations single-handedly

evidence.outcome: Located missing child when professional law enforcement had exhausted all leads
evidence.description: Pursued unconventional investigative methods that proved successful

evidence.outcome: Successfully challenged government agency cover-up to protect community
evidence.description: Persisted against institutional resistance and gaslighting to expose truth

evidence.outcome: Organized and executed 3 rescue operations under extreme conditions
evidence.description: Coordinated with law enforcement and civilians to save lives

workHistory.title: Sales Clerk / Floor Manager
workHistory.description: Managed day-to-day store operations including customer service, inventory management, cash handling, opening/closing procedures, and seasonal merchandising. Frequently served as sole employee during shifts.
achievements: Managed store solo during peak seasons (200+ daily customers)
Maintained vendor relationships for 50+ product categories

workHistory.title: Waitress
workHistory.description: Food service and customer-facing role in grocery deli department. Gained foundational customer service and food handling skills.

savedJobs.title: Director of Victim Advocacy
savedJobs.company: National Center for Missing & Exploited Children (NCMEC)
savedJobs.description: Lead victim advocacy programs supporting families of missing and exploited children. Coordinate with law enforcement, social services, and media for family support and case resolution.

savedJobs.title: Store Manager
savedJobs.description: Manage all aspects of locally-owned hardware store including staff, inventory, vendor relations, community events, and customer experience.

savedJobs.title: Licensed Private Investigator
savedJobs.description: Conduct investigations for attorneys, insurance companies, and private clients. Missing persons, background checks, surveillance, and asset searches.
